  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Class that stores the data of a client and differentiates it from other players based on the account's unique nickname.
    AccountResponse
    This class is used to inform the client of whether or not their registration/login was successful.
    AccountSetUp
    This class is used to send the chosen nickname to the server
    Action
    Action is implemented by other classes It contains the methods to find the possible paths, the action information and the weapons needed for the actions
    ActionBuilder
    This class is used to inform the model about which action type has been chosen for the current turn action
    Adrenaline
    Class to launch a new client, it lets the client choose the user interface.
    Ammo
    Ammo is the enumeration class which defines the three different kinds of ammo.
    ArenaBuilder
    ArenaReader is a class which parses a JSON file containing the description about a map and creates an instance of Map
    AtomicEffectsFactory
    Class that implements every effect of the weapons in the game
    AtomicTarget
    This class contains data about the targets chosen for each atomic weapon effect of the Shoot action
    AtomicWeaponEffect
    Interface of a weapon effect, implemented by other classes
    BaseEffect
    Extension of WeaponEffect class, this class is for the base effect of a weapon
    Board
    Board is an object which contains information about the current state of a player in the game, like his health bar, his marks received by other players and his weapon currently unloaded
    BoardDetails
    This class contains information for player boards shown to the client
    BoardsRequest
    This class is used to request board information from the server
    BoardsResponse
    This class is used to send board information to the clients
    Card
    Card is the supertype for Weapon, Tile and PowerUp.
    CardLoader
    Class that's used to load all the cards in a game
    ChainEffect
    Extension of ChainEffect class, this class if for the chain effect
    ChosenEffect
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon effect has been chosen for Shoot action
    ChosenMapSetUp
    This class is used to inform the model about which map has been chosen for the game
    ChosenPowerUp
    This class is used to inform the model about which power up has been chosen to perform an action
    ChosenPowerUpEffect
    This class is used to inform the model about which power up effect has been chosen the action
    ChosenSpawnPointSetUp
    This class is used to inform the model about the color of the room in which the client will spawn
    ChosenTargets
    This class is used to inform the model about which atomic targets have been chosen for Shoot action
    ChosenWeapon
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon has been chosen for Shoot action
    ClientInterface
    Interface that represents a generic client.
    ClientSetUp
    This class is used to update the nickname saved in the view from default to chosen one
    CliParser
    Class to parse inputs from command line.
    CliPrinter
    Class to display messages on command line
    CliUserInterface
    Class that implements the user interface using command line.
    ClosedLobbyException
    This exception is thrown when a client tries to access a lobby that is closed.
    ConfigFileReader
    Class to read config files.
    ConnectionStage
    Class that handles the connection stage
    Controller
    This class implements the controller part of the MVC design pattern.
    DataForClient
    Class that represents generic data that has to be sent to the client.
    DataForController
    This interface is implemented by every class that has the purpose of notifying the model of any changes during a match
    DataForServer
    Class that represents data that has to be sent to the server.
    Deck
    Deck is the supertype for WeaponsDeck, TilesDeck and PowerUpsDeck.
    DeckCreator
    Abstract class for the deck creation, implemented by subclass
    DirectionRequirement
    DirectionRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement class
    DiscardedWeapon
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon has been discarded
    DistanceRequirement
    DistanceRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    EffectDetails
    This class contains information for weapon effects shown to the client
    EndGameStatus
    This class is sent to the client when a game ends.
    FiguresLoader
    Class to display the players' figures
    Game
    Class used to access the entire model package
    GameInterface
    Class that creates the graphic interface of the game
    GameModel
    This class creates and update all the data of the game, map, squares, players and player's boards
    GameStartedException
    This exception is thrown when a client tries to access a lobby in which the game has already started.
    GraphicUserInterface
    Class that initializes the GUI
    GUIController
    Class that update and send data to the server and client
    IllegalTargetException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to hit other players that are not reachable with the weapon's effect.
    IllegalUseOfPowerUpException
    This exception is thrown when a player uses a power up effect in the wrong way.
    LimitedDirectionRequirement
    Extension of DirectionRequirement
    Lobby
    This class is used to gather all the clients waiting for other players before starting a new game.
    LobbyStage
    Class that handles the lobby stage
    LoginStage
    Class that handles the login stage
    MainServer
    Singleton class that represents the main server hosting a game.
    Map
    Map is a Singleton class which contains the description about the map currently used in a game.
    MapInfo
    This class is sent to the client to inform them of the map chosen for the game.
    MapLoader
    Class that loads the selected map
    MapRequest
    This class is used to request map information from the server
    MapResponse
    This class is used to send map information to the client
    MapSetUp
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which map they want to choose for the game.
    MessageForClient
    This class is used to send a generic message to the client.
    MoveAction
    Implementation of Action interface, it contains the Move Action methods
    MoveAndGrabAction
    Implementation of Action interface, it contains the Move&Grab Action methods
    MovementAndGrabOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which square they want to move to with the MoveAndGrab Action and what they want to grab from there.
    MovementOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which square they want to move to with the Move Action.
    MoveToVisibleRequirement
    MoveToVisibleRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    MustDiscardWeaponException
    This exception is thrown when a player exceeds the maximum number of weapons they can hold.
    MyBoardRequest
    This class is used to request the client's own player board information from the server
    NewPosition
    This class is used to inform the model about the id of the square where the client wants to move
    NewPositionAndGrabbed
    This class is used to inform the model about the id of the square where the client wants to move and the name of the weapon the want to grab
    NormalSquare  
    NormalSquareDetails
    This class contains information for normal squares shown to the client
    NotEnoughAmmoException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to perform an action that requires ammo but they don't have enough to pay the cost.
    NullRequirement
    NullRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    OptionalEffect
    Extension of WeaponEffect, it creates the optional effects of a weapon
    Player
    Player is the class that represents every client taking part in the game.
    PowerUp
    PowerUp is a Card which provides a bonus to the player who uses its effect, based on the different PowerUpType
    PowerUpDetails
    This class contains information for power ups shown to the client
    PowerUpEffect
    This class creates the concrete effect of every powerUp
    PowerUpEffectOptions
    This class is sent to ask the client in which way they want to use the chosen power up.
    PowerUpOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which of their owned power ups they want to use.
    PowerUpsDeck
    PowerUpsDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of PowerUp cards
    PowerUpsDeckCreator
    PowerUpsDeckCreator is the subclass of DeckCreator and contains the deck of powerups
    PowerUpType
    Enum which lists all the power-up cards available in the game.
    RankingRequest
    This class is used to request ranking information from the server
    RankingResponse
    This map is used to send ranking information to the clients
    ReloadRequest
    This class is sent to the client to ask if they want to reload any of their unloaded weapons.
    ReloadResponse
    This class is used to inform the model about whether or not the client wants to reload any weapon and if so, which one they want to reload
    RmiClient
    Class used to connect a generic client to the server after choosing rmi option.
    RmiClientCallbackInterface
    Interface that declares methods callable by the RMI server on a RMI client, it is used by the server to identify each client
    RmiPlayer
    Class that instantiate a client connected with RMI on the server to maintain a reference to him and send him data whene events occurs.
    RmiServer
    Class that implements a server that manages RMI connection.
    RmiServerClientHandler
    Class that manages communication between clients and server in RMI communication.
    RmiServerInterface
    Interface that declares methods callable by a RMI client on a RMI server, it is the server representation uploaded on the RMI registry which clients looks up for when trying to connect
    RoomRequirement
    RoomRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement, it contains all the requirements for a room effect
    ShootAction
    Implementation of Action interface, it contains all the Shoot Action methods
    ShootOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which weapon they want to use for the shoot action and, if the action is 'adrenaline', the ids of squares they can move to.
    SocketClient
    Class used to connect a generic client to the server after choosing the socket option.
    SocketPlayerThread
    Class that implements the thread (server side) for every single client connected.
    SocketServer
    Class that implements a server with socket connection.
    SpawnPoint
    Spawn Point is a special Square in which a player can spawn after being killed and from where can grab weapons
    SpawnPointDetails
    This class contains information for spawn point shown to the client
    SpawnPointSetUp
    This class is sent to the client to ask which square they want to spawn on by discarding the power up of the same color.
    Square
    Square is a single "element" which compose the map, it is characterized by an id, a room and the links to the other squares in the map
    SquareDetails
    This class contains information for square shown to the client
    SquareDetailsRequest
    This class is used to request square information from the server
    SquareDetailsResponse
    This class is used to send square information to the clients
    SquareTypeAdapter
    SquareTypeAdapter is the class that reads the map data from the json files it extends TypeAdapter
    TagbackRequest
    This class is sent to the client to ask if they want to use their Tagback Grenade.
    TagbackResponse
    This class is used to inform the model about whether or not the client wants to use Tagback Grenade
    TargetDetails
    This class contains information for targets shown to the client
    TargetOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which targets they want to hit with the shoot action.
    TargetType
    Class that specifies all the different type of targets
    Tile
    Tile is a Card which contains Ammos and (optionally) a PowerUp collectible on the game board when a player is located on a square which contains one
    TileFormat
    TileFormat enumerates all the format of tile available in the game
    TileLoader
    Class that loads the tiles requested
    TilesDeck
    TilesDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of Tile cards
    TilesDeckCreator
    TilesDeckCreator is a subclass of DeckCreator TilesDeckCreator creates a deck of the tiles on the map which contain ammo and (eventually) a powerup
    TimeOutNotice
    This class is sent to the client to notify that the timer in Controller has run out.
    TimerCallBack
    This interface is used to define the callback classes for timers.
    TimerThread
    This class is used as timer for player time out.
    Turn
    This class is sent to the client to ask which action they want to perform in their turn.
    UserInterface
    Interface implemented by two different classes in the view package based on the user interface type chosen by the client (cli or gui).
    VisibilityRequirement
    VisibilityRequirement is a implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement It creates visibility requirements for a weapon
    Weapon
    Weapon is a Card which contains the description about a single weapon available in the game and its effects
    WeaponDetails
    This class contains information for weapons shown to the client
    WeaponEffect
    Abstract class for the effects of a weapon, implemented by subclasses
    WeaponEffectRequirement
    WeaponEffectRequirement is implemented by subclasses
    WeaponEffectTypeAdapter
    WeaponEffectTypeAdapter is the class that read all the data of the weapons from the json files, extends TypeAdapter class
    WeaponModeOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which effect they want to perform with the chosen weapon in the shoot action.
    WeaponsDeck
    WeaponsDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of Weapon cards
    WeaponsDeckCreator
    WeaponsDeckCreator is a subclass of DeckCreator, it creates the weapons' deck
    WeaponsToDiscard
    This class is sent to the client to ask which weapon they want to discard after exceeding the maximum number of three.
    WeaponType
    WeaponType is the enumeration class which lists all the weapon types in the game.
